reports.query:
**This is your first dashboard!** 
 
You can click (â‹®) to edit this report, or add a new report to get started. You can run any Cypher query directly from each report and render data in a variety of formats.

reports.title: Graph of all works published by year
Table of all works and their name, doi, id, and publication date
reports.query: MATCH (n)-[e]->(m) RETURN n.name as Work_Name, n.doi as DOI, n.id as ID, n.pub_date as Publication_Date LIMIT 300

reports.title: Pie chart of how many works make up each year
reports.query:
Match (n)-[e]->(m)
RETURN m as Year, COUNT(n) as Work

reports.title: Bar chart of number of works by year
reports.query:
MATCH (n)-[e]->(m)
RETURN m as Year, COUNT(n) as Work
ORDER BY m ASC
